item.title: Outside no.129, 6th July
item.description:
Poor state of road surface has caused damage to a fixture leading to an ongoing leak onto the road. This has been a repeated problem, every time it is fixed, the road surface is relaid poorly meaning it is only a matter of time until the problem recurs.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 131, West End Lane, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes and uneven surface on both sides of the road, 6th July
item.description:
Presents a trip hazard for children crossing the road to and from school at the crossing point. Humps and drain cover are in a poor state and the previous patch repair has not lasted long. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upton Road, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ticks in grass - needs cutting, 6th July
item.description:
The long grass on the bank in the playground behind the roundabout and the slide has ticks - my child came home with one after playing there today
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bailes Place, New Beckenham, London

item.title: Enfield council neglect, 6th July
item.description:
Fly tips on Downes Court and Hoppers road been there for days on unswept roads, The entire borough is full of filth and rats. They are refusing to move the fly tips and targeting Winchmore Hill for non cleaning.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hoppers Road, Palmers Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet
